verses.name: Daniel 1:10
verses.text: And the prince of the eunuchs said unto Daniel, I fear my lord the king, who hath appointed your meat and your drink: for why should he see your faces worse liking than the children which are of your sort? then shall ye make me endanger my head to the king.

verses.name: Daniel 1:11
verses.text: Then said Daniel to Melzar, whom the prince of the eunuchs had set over Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah,

verses.name: Daniel 1:12
verses.text: Prove thy servants, I beseech thee, ten days; and let them give us pulse to eat, and water to drink.
